overview: The story of how an Australian and international community of blacksmiths, welders, artists and volunteers responded to the devastating Black Saturday bush-fires by creating perhaps the nation's most ambitious public artwork and memorial â€“ The Blacksmith's Tree, a three tonne, 9.8-meter tall stainless steel and copper gum tree.
tagline: The Making of The Blacksmith's Tree.
title: Forged from Fire
